Also, to test point cloud generation with Atlas, add the following to atlas_bringup.launch:
~~~
  <!-- Stereo image processing -->
  <node ns="sandia_hands/left_hand/camera" name="stereo_proc" pkg="stereo_image_proc" type="stereo_image_proc" respawn="false" output="screen">
    <param name="disparity_range" type="int" value="128"/>
    <param name="approximate_sync" type="bool" value="false"/>
  </node>

  <!-- Stereo image processing -->
  <node ns="sandia_hands/right_hand/camera" name="stereo_proc" pkg="stereo_image_proc" type="stereo_image_proc" respawn="false" output="screen">
    <param name="disparity_range" type="int" value="128"/>
    <param name="approximate_sync" type="bool" value="false"/>
  </node>
~~~
